titles.title: A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of Common Cause, et al. v. Joseph R. Biden, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 6/6/2012--Passed Senate without amendment. Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent in the case of Common Cause, et al. v. Joseph R. Biden, et al. : (1) Joseph R. Biden, Jr., the Vice President of the United States; (2) Nancy Erickson, Secretary of the Senate; (3) Terrance W. Gainer, Senate Sergeant at Arms; and (4) Elizabeth MacDonough, Senate Parliamentarian.
